Update build tools

Hack to go back when opening an external site is no longer needed since Facebook has fixed the linker's bad behavior on the mobile site.

This fix should help with Issue #15.

Fix Android version check, Jelly Bean could be 16-18

- Added support for Basic Version of the mobile site (called it 'Minimale Version')

Icon designed by Constantin Eckstein
Make change default plugin state to ON_DEMAND
Add support for hiding the alert dialog when the web site requesting location doesn't need it anymore
Using a custom path for the database is no longer supported

FINE_LOCATION permission is now needed in order for the geolocation feature to work (check-ins).

Location will still not be sent to Facebook unless you have the 'Allow check-ins' option enabled.
